import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import { format } from "date-fns"; import { Grid, Card, Icon, IconButton, Checkbox, Fab, Avatar, Hidden } from "@material-ui/core"; const RowCards = () => { return [1, 2, 3, 4,5,6,7,8].map(id => (
{id % 2 === 1 ? ( star_outline ) : ( date_range )} Project {id}
{format(new Date().getTime(), "MM/dd/yyyy hh:mma")}
more_vert
)); }; export default RowCards;
